item.title: About E-Shortlet
item.dc:creator: chinedunnaji94
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Eshortlet.

Comfortability and Ease with E-Shoerletbook: Your Ultimate Booking Solution

In today's fast-paced world, comfort and convenience are paramount. E-Shortletbook, your ultimate booking solution, is here to ensure that your life becomes easier and more enjoyable. With a focus on providing an effortless and efficient booking experience, E-Shortletbook is designed to cater to all your needs, whether you're planning a vacation, scheduling an appointment, or reserving a table at your favourite restaurant.

Comfort at Your Fingertips

E-Shortletbook is built with user comfort in mind. Our intuitive interface and user-friendly design make it easy for anyone to navigate and book services effortlessly. The platform is optimized for both desktop and mobile devices, ensuring that you can make reservations from anywhere, at any time. No more waiting in long lines or dealing with cumbersome booking processes – with E-Shortletbook, everything you need is just a few clicks away.

Streamlined Booking Process

We understand that your time is valuable. That's why E-Shortletbook offers a streamlined booking process that minimises the time and effort required to secure your reservations. With our advanced search and filter options, you can quickly find the services or events that match your preferences. Once you've made your selection, our secure payment gateway ensures a smooth and hassle-free transaction.

Personalized Experience

At E-Shortletbook, we believe in delivering a personalised experience to each of our users. Our platform remembers your preferences and past bookings, making it easier for you to find and book services that you love. Whether you're a frequent traveler, a regular diner, or someone who enjoys trying new activities, E-Shortletbook tailors its offerings to suit your unique tastes and needs.

Reliable and Trustworthy

Trust is a crucial factor when it comes to online bookings, and E-Shortletbook is committed to maintaining the highest standards of reliability and trustworthiness. Our platform features verified reviews and ratings from real users, helping you make informed decisions. Additionally, our dedicated customer support team is always ready to assist you with any queries or concerns, ensuring that your experience with E-Shortletbook is always positive.

Enhancing Your Lifestyle

E-Shortletbook is more than just a booking platform – it's a lifestyle enhancer. By simplifying the booking process and providing access to a wide range of services and experiences, we help you make the most of your free time. Whether you're looking to relax and unwind, explore new places, or enjoy quality time with loved ones, E-Shortletbook is your go-to solution for a stress-free and enjoyable life.

Why Choose E-Shortletbook?

  • Convenience: Book services from the comfort of your home or on the go with our mobile-friendly platform.
  • Efficiency: Save time with our quick and easy booking process.
  • Personalization: Enjoy a tailored experience based on your preferences and past bookings.
  • Reliability: Trust in verified reviews, secure transactions, and dedicated customer support.
  • Enhanced Lifestyle: Access a wide range of services and experiences to enrich your life.

In conclusion, E-Shortletbook is dedicated to making your life easier and more comfortable without stressing so much. As we are gradually moving into the tech world this platform will be able to help you get the best of the services we have to offer. Our commitment to providing a seamless and enjoyable booking experience for everyone who needs to book in or hire any of our awesome services, ensuring that you can focus on what truly matters – enjoying the moments that make life special. Choose E-Shortletbook and discover a new level of convenience and comfort in your daily life.

The Birth of an Idea

The journey of E-Shortlet began when its founder, NNAJI CHINEDU, experienced firsthand the frustrations of booking accommodations and car hire services during a business trip. Long waits, hidden fees, and complicated interfaces left mr Chinedu determined to find a better solution. Teaming up with like-minded individuals who shared a passion for technology and customer service, mr Chinedu set out to create a platform that would eliminate these common pain points in there booking world by creating a simpler and easier user interface that can enable almost everyone book or hire any of the awesome services.

Eshortlet, Your comfort is our priority

Welcome to a world where your comfort is our priority and we have made it possible for you to book in for any apartment of your choice seamlessly.The intriguing part of it is you can also book for a pool party, book wedding arenas and lots more!

Get Started

item.title: Buy/Lease
item.dc:creator: chinedunnaji94
item.content:encoded:
Have a glance of the various beautiful parts of the residence.

The above properties are currently out for sale. Incase you are interested in purchasing any of the above property hit the buy button below.

Buy Now

Eshortlet: Revolutionising Short-Term and Long-Term Rentals.

Overview:
Eshortlet is an innovative booking company specialising in short-term and long-term rentals. Catering to both business and leisure traveler's, Eshortlet offers a diverse range of accommodations, including apartments, houses, land, and unique stays, ensuring a personalised and comfortable experience for all its clients.

Mission:
Eshortlet's mission is to simplify the short-term rental process by providing a seamless, user-friendly platform. The company aims to bridge the gap between property owners and travelers, facilitating hassle-free bookings and memorable stays.

Key Features:

  1. Wide Range of Properties:
    Eshortlet boasts an extensive portfolio of properties in prime locations. From cozy city apartments to luxurious beachfront villas, the company ensures that every type of traveler finds the perfect stay.
  2. User-Friendly Platform:
    The Eshortlet website and mobile app are designed with simplicity in mind. Users can easily search for properties, view high-quality images, read detailed descriptions, and book their stays with just a few clicks.
  3. Verified Listings:
    To maintain high standards, Eshortlet verifies all property listings. This ensures that travelers receive exactly what they expect, reducing the risk of discrepancies and enhancing customer satisfaction.
  4. 24/7 Customer Support:
    Eshortlet offers round-the-clock customer support to address any queries or issues that may arise before, during, or after a stay. This commitment to customer service sets Eshortlet apart from many competitors.
  5. Flexible Booking Options:
    Understanding the varied needs of travelers, Eshortlet provides flexible booking options. Whether it's a one-night stay or a month-long rental, the company accommodates different durations with ease.
  6. Competitive Pricing:
    Eshortlet ensures that its pricing is competitive, offering value for money without compromising on quality. Regular promotions and discounts further enhance affordability for travelers.

Target Audience:
Eshortlet serves a broad audience, including:

  • Business Travelers: Professionals seeking comfortable and convenient accommodations for short-term business trips.
  • Leisure Travelers: Tourists looking for unique and memorable places to stay during vacations.
  • Remote Workers: Individuals in need of temporary living spaces that provide both comfort and productivity.

Conclusion:
Eshortlet is redefining the short-term rental market with its user-centric approach, diverse property listings, and unwavering commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. As the demand for flexible, short-term accommodations continues to rise, Eshortlet is poised to become a leading name in the industry, offering unparalleled experiences for travelers worldwide.

Book Now

House Available For Sale Or Lease.

Do you want to buy the best properties for an affordable price and most especially speaking directly with landlord or property owners eliminating the stress that comes with looking for a house for sale or rent with house agents. Here buyers are abler to connect to the sellers swiftly and directly. click left and right to view.

Buy Now

Land Available For Sale

Do you want to buy lands ? We got your back! As real estate is very important in the development and revolution of human. We should all try to invest in our future through real estates. click left or right to view.

Buy Now

SOCIALS

item.title: E-shortletServices
item.dc:creator: chinedunnaji94
item.content:encoded:
E-SERVICES

E-HairHub

E-HairHub is simply an online system that connects everyone in a city/state with professional barbers ,hairstylist for women,Kids haircut and for everyone. Our professional service providers are professional at their respective services. So expect nothing but the best from our service providers, who are ready to deliver the best services in Nigeria and Africa at large. All barbers/Hairstylist registered with us have at least two years of working experience to ensure users total satisfaction.

Order Now

SHORTLET/APARTMENT BOOKING

Welcome to a world of limitless possibilities, where the journey is to make booking for an apartment or shortly with the best comfort and extremely relaxing rooms and Most of all you are assured of a 24/7 electricity supply and a stand by security very easy by just hitting the book button and where you will be asked for basic information which are required. We also have 24/7 Stand by car hire service that can take you around the town at a very affordable prices.

Book Now

CAR HIRE SERVICES

We also car hire service with armed security if need be, These are security measures we take to ensure our customer safety is assured. You can simply book one of our luxurious cars for your mobility and security. All cars registered are absolutely clean and have professional drivers that can drive you around town safely. Please note, Car higher services are not free as they are only collaborated with us and can provide 24/7 hours of which have hair prices and you have to pay for those offers if you want. This services are strictly for those who needs mobility to move or tour around.

Hire Now

HOUSES , LAND FOR SALE OR LEASE

Here at E-SHORTLET, We also connect owners/landlord's and those who wants sell properties of all kind. Ranging from a one bed room fully furnished apartment to 6 bedrooms duplex to smart houses and a lot more for an affordable price. Imagine when you discuss a price with the owner/landlord of the properties instead of an agents who tends to get percentage off every sale and yet you won’t get what you want. Here at E-Shortletbook ,we offer registered house inspectors that takes you around the properties you want to buy, lease, apartment for shortlet ,sale and lots more. Our number one aim is to make it seamlessly possible to buy any property of your choice seamlessly by directly connecting owners/ Landlords through the E -Shortlet system.

Buy Now

EVENTS CENTER HIRE

E-Shortlet have made it possible for everyone to be able to hire all kinds of event centers that is registered with the E-SHORTLET. Here we offer services like; Booking for a weeding space, want a pool party but don’t t know what pool to use? We got you! We have made it possible for you to book in with us and we will provide your with the best pool services registered with us and have our 24/7 inspection officer with you at all time. Want house party but you are confused on which or what house to use? worry no more here on ESHORTLET, You can book the best houses for all house parties. Want a space for a picnic ? We got your we have our 24/7 car hire service that will take you to you choice of picnic locations which will be on our mobile website or apps.

Hire Now

RESTURANTS BOOKIN

E-SHORTLET software, has made it seamlessly easy to book in for a dine in at the best of the best restaurants in your city. We have collaborated with some 5 star restaurants and lounge that is nothing but the best ! You can order both your local and intercontinental dishes from the best restaurants that has collaborated with us as we only collaborate with best to ensure our customers satisfaction and comfort is achieved. The awesome part of this system is you can book all this by just hitting restaurant booking link and tell us which restaurant you will love to make your order from and we give you a feedback ASAP. We are have just collaborated with the GEMINI LOUNGE AND RESTAURANT. Kindly click on the book now to book in or order directly from the lounge

You can simply book in for a dine or order directly from the E-Shortletbook your choice of food from the menu. and we will deliver to your preferred location as soon as possible.

Book Now

HIRE CAR HERE.

Get Started

CAR HIRE SERVICE.

Get Started

APARTMENT BOOKING.

Get Started

item.title: Daniel - 2025-01-07 15:11:44
item.content:encoded:
Hello,
We got your website information from the network administrator, and after testing it to ensure everything was functioning smoothly, we identified several SEO (Search Engine Optimization) related shortcomings. These are preventing your website from appearing on major search engines like Google, Bing, and Yahoo. Fixing these issues is both simple and crucial for incre asing your online visibility.
Please reply with your phone number, time zone, and availability for a quick call so we can resolve this at the earliest for you.
Best Regards, Daniel Edwards <!--more--> AUTHOR: Daniel AUTHOR EMAIL: danieledwards.web@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact form submission IP: 223.237.44.190 JSON_DATA {"1_First name":"Daniel","2_Last name":"Edwards","3_Email":"danieledwards.web@gmail.com","4_Message":"Hello,

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: chinedunnaji94
item.content:encoded:
WELCOME TO E-SHORTLET

In today's fast-paced world, comfort and convenience are paramount. E-Shortletbook, your ultimate booking solution, is here to ensure that your life becomes easier and more enjoyable. With a focus on providing an effortless and efficient booking experience, E-Shorletbook is designed to cater to all your needs, from buying a house to renting an apartment connecting the tenants directly to landlords. Whether you're planning a vacation, scheduling an appointment, or reserving a table at your favourite restaurant, event centre's , best pool for pool parties, best clubs, Exclusive HairHub for all hair care for both men, women and kid ,car hire, full state tour(powered by our luxurious Car hire service) and lost more. In time you will be able to book almost anything on the E-Shortletbook system.

Get Started

Discover Beautiful Apartments Around You.

A Home Away From Home

Welcome to Eshortlet, Your number 1 booking company. Here you can get the best apartment around you for a very fair price. Eshortlet connects customers to owners seamlessly, and most importantly it is user friendly, designed for everyone. They could be a range of over 200 or more furnished apartment's/houses and lots more available in your area and you wouldn't know, but we have made that easy for you by providing you with the best system that has made it easy for you to book the most beautiful and affordable Shortlet/Apartment and a whole lot more.

Get Started

Thinking of Comfort outside your house ?

Eshortlet was established basically to help a lot of people both local and international find a conducive environment where your security is assured. Our aim is to make a booking system to help the booking industry in Nigeria and in Africa at large achieve an easy booking experience. This system connects users all over the globe with an easy and a user friendly system to be able to book in for all of the awesome services we have made available for everyone.

Book Now!

A view of the living room area.

With the best interior decoration designs from the best decor designers, your comfort is 100% assured. Have a tour and bless your eyes. With this system your comfortability is assured. On Eshortletbook it is possible for you to book in for your favourite Apartment, also offer a range of services like, Car hire, event centre for your shows or weeding ceremony, A full state tour with our luxurious cars available to take your round the abuja city. The aim to make life extremely easy for everyone and most importantly provide as much job opportunity as possible.

Book Now!

The living Room.

Eshortlet was established basically to help a lot of people both local and international find a conducive environment where their security is assured. This company connect owners/agents to customers who are interested in any of our superb services we have made specially for everyone.

Book Now

The Pool Side View.

Are you looking for place to relax and work away from home ? You are in the right path!m Kingly click book now to book any of the above services we offer.

Get started →

Book Now

Relaxation Area.

Want to have a tour around your neighbourhood ? With standby hire car hire service and an armed stand by protection squad to ensure your safety along side a professional tour guide to make the tour an awesome and fun time.

Get started →

Book Now

Enjoy Luxury.

Hire services

Book Now

24/7 care hires service available.

Hire Services

Book Now

1 bed room furnished

Shortlet Apartments

Book Now

2 bed room furnished

Shortlet Apartments

Book now

Testimonials

Jayla H

"This has made easy for me to book for beautiful apartments all over the states. good job 👍 "

Hope D.

"Awesome service love it. 😊 ."

Click left or right to see beautiful luxury apartment we have partnered with to give you the best. Your comfortability and convince is our number one priority.

More pictures of the various apartments and houses available on EshortletBook.

  • Abuja, Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria
  • Abuja Municipal, Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria

Hours

Monday—Monday

24/7

Contact us

Email us ✉️ :Eshortletsoriginal@gmail.com

Call us 📞 : 091325334800

No 20 akupusi celestine crescent

Abuja,Nigeria 🇳🇬

item.title: Book/Hire
item.dc:creator: chinedunnaji94
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to a world where your comfort is our priority and we have made it possible for you to book in for any apartment of your choice seamlessly. We have also made it possible for you to be able to hire a car, a space for your events, a full state tour(Exclusively for abuja resident for now), A pool for your pool parties, A beautiful shortlet for your house parties, and lots more we tend to add as soon as we get more collaborators. To enjoy all this beautiful services, Kindly fill in the form as the informations are required. Then in text area you can tell us what services you need and we will get back to ASAP. You an also book in through our official instagram which has been added on the website. To do that click on the instagram to icon the website, Our 24 hours customer care team will be there to give you the best of the best services.

You can also make payment directly from your bank with your bank card. Do that by clicking here

  • Abuja Municipal, Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria

Rate Us

item.title: Register
item.dc:creator: chinedunnaji94
item.content:encoded:
How to Register on an Eshortlet Book Company

Registering with an e-shortlet book company is a straightforward process that opens the door to a vast library of digital reading materials. Here’s a step-by-step guide to help you get started:

1. Visit the Company’s Website

Begin by navigating to the official website of the e-shortlet book company. Look for a clear "Sign Up" or "Register" button, typically found on the homepage.

2. Fill Out the Registration Form

Once you click on the registration button, you’ll be directed to a form. Common fields include:

  • Name: Your full name.
  • Email Address: A valid email address you regularly use.
  • Phone Number: A valid phone number.

3. Agree to Terms and Conditions

Most companies will require you to read and accept their terms of service and privacy policy. It’s important to understand these documents before agreeing.

Registering Your Company with the Eshortlet Book Booking System

If your company is looking to join the Eshortlet Book booking system, it’s a great opportunity to streamline your operations and enhance customer experience. Here’s what you need to know about the registration process:

Benefits of Joining the Eshortlet Book Booking System

  1. Increased Visibility: Gain access to a wider audience and increase your brand’s exposure in the digital marketplace.
  2. Streamlined Operations: The booking system simplifies the management of reservations, reducing administrative workload and minimizing errors.
  3. Customer Convenience: Offer your customers an easy-to-use platform for booking services, leading to improved satisfaction and retention.
  4. Access to Analytics: Benefit from insights and analytics on customer behavior and booking trends, helping you make informed business decisions.

Registration Steps

  1. Visit the Eshortlet Book Website: Navigate to the official website and look for the section dedicated to businesses or partners interested in the booking system.
  2. Select "Register": Click on the "Join Us" or "Register Your Business" option. This will guide you to the appropriate registration form.
  3. Complete the Registration Form: Fill in the required details, including:
  • Company Name: Your official business name.
  • Contact Details: Primary contact person’s information, including email and phone number.
  • Business Type: Specify the type of services you offer (e.g., rentals, accommodations, etc.).
  • Location: Your business address and the regions you service.
  1. Review Terms and Conditions: Carefully read the terms and conditions governing the use of the booking system. Accept them to proceed.
  2. Submit Additional Documentation: You may need to provide documents such as business licenses, proof of ownership, and insurance details, depending on your industry.
  3. Wait for Approval: After submission, the Eshortlet Book team will review your application. You will receive a confirmation email regarding your registration status.
  4. Set Up Your Business Profile: Once approved, log into the system to create your business profile. This includes uploading images, detailing your services, and setting pricing.
  5. Integrate with Your Operations: Familiarize yourself with the booking management tools provided by Eshortlet Book, and integrate them with your existing systems to ensure a seamless experience.
  6. Promote Your Services: Utilize marketing tools offered by the platform to promote your services and attract customers.

Conclusion

Registering with the Eshortlet Book booking system can significantly enhance your business operations and customer engagement. By following these steps, your company can easily join the platform and take advantage of its features. If you have any questions or need assistance during the registration process, the Eshortlet Book support team is available to help you. Happy reading.

submit
